::KitKat::

She received the message. "I'll be there soon, myself and two others."

She turned to GoldenEye and Drillbit. "You two, follow me. We're 
going to get some new back up if possable." She went to the cargo 
hold and grabbed two jet packs. She handed one to Drillbit. "Here, 
put this on and let's go."

She put on her jetpack.
GoldenEye transformed into Eagle mode and waited to the command to 
take off.
She opened her com to Destructor. "I'm leaving the pod and taking two 
with me to go get that ship. You come here and get the rest of the 
troops and supplies to the base. Understood?"

She turned to DarkMouse. "DarkMouse, Your in charge untill Destructor 
gets here or I return. Got it?"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> (Just a quick note, when Vehement ordered his guys to play his 
transmission 
> continuously, I meant non stop.  Always.  Over and over again.  For 
five 
> hours or so)
> 
> 
> 
> 
> Vehement/The Oblitercons:
> 
> 
> 
> 
>  Vehement pressed a button, stopping the transmissions that were 
going to 
> KitKat's base non-stop.  He activated his personal comm. unit on 
his computer 
> forearm. 
> 
> "KitKat, leader of the Predacons?  Hmmm...I would like to know 
which base or 
> bases you hold, your coordinates to be exact.  There are several on 
scanners, 
> and I don't exactly want to be the person that helps a Predacon 
trying to 
> gain leadership." he said without a tone of disrespect.  A female 
Predacon 
> leader? he thought.  Interesting.
> 
> "My coordinates are 87-1-28 Sector Eminent.  How many troops will 
you be 
> sending?  I don't want to open my doors to the wrong group and be 
> slaughtered."
> 
> He awaited a reply, hoping his message wouldn't be filled with 
static.
> 
> ========
> 
> Dark One looked to Zardus and nodded, looking to his forces.  Dark 
One 
> transformed into his jet fighter mode, his cockpit opening and Hiss 
climbing 
> inside.
> 
> Dark One took off for the base, the three other Oblitercons 
climbing into a 
> shuttle that took off after Dark One.
